<script>
function writeCookie (key, value, days) {
    var date = new Date();
    // Default at 365 days.
    days = days || 365;
    // Get unix milliseconds at current time plus number of days
    date.setTime(+ date + (days * 86400000)); //24 * 60 * 60 * 1000
    window.document.cookie = key + "=" + value + "; expires=" + date.toGMTString() + "; path=/";
    return value;
}
jQuery('document').ready(function(){
	jQuery('.sli_related_searches, .sli_search_suggestions, .toolbar').on('click', 'a', SLI.backToTop);
});

function getCookie(name) {
  var value = "; " + document.cookie;
  var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
  if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
}

function changeVATDisplay() {
	var vatDisp = getCookie('vatdisplay');
	if(vatDisp == 'ex') {
		writeCookie('vatdisplay', 'inc', 1);
	} else if (vatDisp == 'inc') {
		writeCookie('vatdisplay', 'ex', 1);
	} else {
		writeCookie('vatdisplay', 'inc', 1);
	}
	SLI.ajaxSearchSubmit(window.location.href);
}
</script>
